attributes.action: Call a general election NOW due to total lack of confidence in MP,s after the expenses row
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public are so disgusted with the state of MP,s greed at the moment .We put them there and I think we have heard more than enough.What right do they think they have to pass laws etc for us .Ever heard of people in glass houses.I am sick to my stomach of all of them and I think the people should now have their say

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
